metadata.name: Animal World
metadata.description:
A reminder of the need to protect and preserve our natural world and it's inhabitants. In this World, the turtle and the elephant represents the interconnectedness and interdependence of all living thins on earth. The mini worlds on their backs shows the diverse and delicate ecosystems that exist in our planet, and how they rely on each other to thrive. 

Duality refers to the idea that opposite or seemingly contradictory ideas or concepts can coexist and be true or valid at the same time. It's a reminder that all things are interconnected and interdependent, that the world is made up of many different but complementary aspects. Understanding this concept can help us not only to better comprehend ourselves and the world around us, but also to live in a more balanced and harmonious way.
